description: Bibliography on Gender in Byzantium This resource started out as a bibliography on women in Byzantium, begun by Thalia Gouma-Peterson and maintained by Alice-Mary Talbot. Work on women’s history has recently been supplemented by studies on eunuchs, and a concern for masculinity, which together enable work on the Byzantine gender system.

is_part_of.title: Dumbarton Oaks Resources for Byzantine Studies

title: Bibliography on Gender in Byzantium
